ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller

Class FallingEdgeUSLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.FallingEdgeUSLocalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UltrasonicController

    public class FallingEdgeUSLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
implements UltrasonicController
    Performs falling edge localization. By spinning around, the robot is able to get the distances that surround it.
    With a certain threshold, the angles alpha and beta are those points.
    If the robot is on the 45 degree line, then the orientation of the robot can be calculated and corrected to face the true 0 degree.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FallingEdgeUSLocalization.AngleType
      List of angles detected: alpha is first angle detected, beta is second angle detected.

    • Method Detail

      • doLocalization

        public void doLocalization()
        Performs actual US localization by telling robot to spin, detect the position of the walls relative to itself, and calculate the positional offset. By placing the robot on the 45 degree line from the corner, we are able to determine the orientation by detection the angle at which a threshold is crossed with the distances to the two walls.

      • getAngleFallingEdge

        private double getAngleFallingEdge(FallingEdgeUSLocalization.AngleType angleType)
        Method to get falling edge angles.
        Parameters:
        angleType - angle one wishes to detect.
        Returns:
        angle when wall is detected in radians.

      • calculateHeading

        private double calculateHeading(double angleA,
                                double angleB)
        Calculates deltaTheta which is the offset of the odometer's orientation relative to the actual orientation
        Parameters:
        angleA - back wall angle (alpha).
        angleB - front wall angle (beta).
        Returns:
        heading to add to current theta.

      • setSpeeds

        public void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
                      int rSpd)
        Method to set speed of motors.
        Parameters:

        rSpd - right motor speed.
